Related repos

  • Open source toolkit for training diffusion image models with a simple web or command line interface—supports latest models, requires high-end Nvidia GPU
  • YOLOv5 fast object detection models by Ultralytics
  • fast vision-language model for on-device AI
  • Visualises neural network activations in 3D
  • curated computer vision resources, papers, tools, datasets
  • Upscales images with AI algorithms
  • Big Vision: codebase for training large-scale vision models using Jax/Flax andTPUs
  • open-source language and vision models with huge context window and hybrid attention
  • Image super-resolution and restoration tool using deep learning models
